thread.title: Caring for elders often a costly quagmire
thread.title_full: Caring for elders often a costly quagmire

title: Caring for elders often a costly quagmire
text:
Published By: Louisville Courier-Journal - Today 
People with dementia often need 24-hour care, leaving families in an emotional, financial and logistical quagmire. ...
